hints.text:
Select an organization from the list
to view her contributions

Select an organization from the list
to view her contributions

Select an author from the list
to view his or her contributions

You can add multiple cards
of the same item for comparison.
Just click again on the item in the list

Filter items by typing 
a few characters in the Filter input

Pie-charts only show top 10 results.
Check the Table view for full results

On pie-charts you can click on a legend
to toggle its display in the pie
